title: 6-DOF Robotic Arm
shortDescription: Designed a compact 6-DOF arm with belt-driven joints and custom gearboxes.
longDescription: Led end-to-end design of a 6-DOF robotic arm for pick-and-place tasks. Performed structural FEA on links and joints, tolerance analysis for bearings, and integrated stepper drivers with microcontroller-based control. Prototyped and validated repeatability (±0.4 mm).

title: CFD Optimization of HVAC Duct
shortDescription: Reduced pressure drop by 23% via filleted transitions and guide vanes.
longDescription: Conducted steady-state CFD to evaluate multiple duct geometries. Used k-ω SST turbulence model; validated results with manometer data. Final design cut pressure drop by 23% and noise by 3 dBA.

title: Custom Planetary Gearbox
shortDescription: High-torque, low-backlash gearbox with 3D printed housings.
longDescription: Designed a 3-stage planetary gearbox with spur gears, achieving 81:1 ratio. Evaluated tooth stresses per AGMA; tuned infill orientations to improve stiffness. Backlash < 0.7°.
